tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE FAQ (     faq_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,     question TEXT NOT NULL,     answer TEXT NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE Category (     category_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,     category_name VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE FAQ_Category (     faq_id INT NOT NULL,     category_id INT NOT NULL,     PRIMARY KEY (faq_id, category_id),     FOREIGN KEY (faq_id) REFERENCES FAQ(faq_id),     FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES Category(category_id) );

CREATE TABLE category (category_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
category_name TEXT NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE faq_category (faq_id INT NOT NULL,
category_id INT NOT NULL);
